name: Red Only
description:
Another meditative spanking experience. This time from the other side. It's probably really hard to look at yourself like that in real life, but cameras placed this way for the better view.

Features:

  • Multiple different marks.
  • Bouncing.
  • Different clothing.
  • Different sounds.
  • Moans.
  • Different stories(reasons) for a spanking.

"ESC" - to completely close the game.
